snippet: The movie studio and cable networks at 21st Century Fox reported better-than-expected results for the quarter, but the broadcast group fared poorly.
abstract: 21st Century Fox reports fiscal first-quarter income of $1.04 billion, or 47 cents a share, down from $1.26 billion, or 54 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue was $7.89 billion for quarter ending Sept 30.
lead_paragraph: The movie studio and cable networks at 21st Century Fox reported better-than-expected results for the quarter, but the broadcast group fared poorly.

headline.main: Strong Film and Cable Profit at Fox Tempered by Network TV
headline.print_headline: Strong Film and CableProfit at Fox Tempered by NetworkTV
